# Unicode Test Data (17.0.0)

This directory vendors a minimal subset of the official Unicode test data for
offline conformance testing.

Source:
- Unicode 17.0.0 test files from https://www.unicode.org/Public/17.0.0/ucd/

Terms of Use:
- https://www.unicode.org/terms_of_use.html

Files:
- auxiliary/GraphemeBreakTest.txt
- auxiliary/LineBreakTest.txt
- auxiliary/WordBreakTest.txt
- auxiliary/SentenceBreakTest.txt
- BidiTest.txt
- BidiCharacterTest.txt
- NormalizationTest.txt
